import React, { useRef, useContext, useState } from "react"; import classes from "./WithoutLogin.module.css"; import CartContext from "../../store/cart-context"; const WithoutLogin = (props) => { const [IsFormValid, setIsFormValid] = useState(false); const cartItems = useContext(CartContext); const first_name = useRef(); const last_name = useRef(); const city = useRef(); const full_address = useRef(); const inputValidate = (val) => { val.current.value.trim().length > 0 ? true : false; }; const confirmHandler = async (event) => { nameValidate = !inputValidate(first_name); lnameValidate = !inputValidate(last_name); cityValidate = !inputValidate(city); addressValidate = !inputValidate(addressValidate); setIsFormValid( nameValidate && lnameValidate && cityValidate && addressValidate ); if (!IsFormValid) { return; } const user_info = { first_name: first_name.current.value, last_name: last_name.current.value, city: city.current.value, full_address: full_address.current.value, }; let order_info = []; for (let items of cartItems.items) { order_info.push(items); } event.preventDefault(); await fetch( "https://food-order-app-4dedb-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/orders.json", { method: "POST", body: JSON.stringify({ customer_info: user_info, order_info: order_info, charge: cartItems.totalAmount.toFixed(2), }), headers: { "Content-type": "application/json" }, } ) .then(props.onCancel) .catch((err) => console.log(err.message)); }; return (
